content: - p2tog and purl across needles 2 1 and 3 p2tog in the last two stitches turn work repeat row a and b till there is 1 stitch left on needle 2 slip the one stitch onto needle 1 needles 2 and 3 have no sts needle 1 should now have 25 sts 25/0/0 right side should be facing you work 4 row of k1p1 bind off lendube on ravelry lennie dubler july 2018 page 3
